import sys

n, m, i, j, a, b = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())

if n < 1 or n > 1000000 or m < 1 or m > 1000000 or i < 1 or i > n or j < 1 or j > m or a < 1 or a > 1000000 or b < 1 or b > 1000000:
    print("Poor Inna and pony!")
    sys.exit(0)

if i == 1 and j == 1 or i == n and j == 1 or i == 1 and j == m or i == n and j == m:
    print(0)
    sys.exit(0)

if i == 1 or i == n or j == 1 or j == m:
    print(1)
    sys.exit(0)

if i == 2 or i == n - 1 or j == 2 or j == m - 1:
    print(2)
    sys.exit(0)
